name: Casual Meetup
description: Join other singles in your age range for the opportunity to meet others in a relaxed environment.

name: Virtual Meetup
description: Join other singles in your age range online for our virtual meetup. A moderator will run fun icebreaker activities and interesting group discussions.

name: Meetup at Local Restaurant
description: Join other singles in your age range for the opportunity to meet others in a relaxed environment. Small groups of four to seven individuals will meet together at a local restaurant.
